alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 3:14PM EDT until June 16 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Crawford County in northwestern Pennsylvania... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 314 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Harmonsburg, or 9 miles west of Meadville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Meadville, Titusville, Linesville, Adamsville, Pymatuning Central, Riceville, Harmonsburg, Lincolnville, Guys Mills, Pymatuning North, Atlantic, Canadohta Lake, Cochranton, Saegertown, Conneautville, Conneaut Lake, Jamestown, Hydetown, Blooming Valley and Townville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
